**User:**
Hey, I've been thinking about creating a project on Verus, but I'm not sure how to get miners to pick it up. What motivates miners to pick up my project on Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
Miners within the Verus ecosystem are motivated to pick up your project because they can mine up to 22 chains simultaneously, maximizing their profits.
